lines.text: By the way, your friend, um, Mr. Potter? He's no longer with us.
There is a saying among we Chinese that tea is the cup of humanity. It would be impious to offer it for any other reason.
I've also heard it is said among the Chinese that there's much hidden in a cup of tea. Discover it with each sip.
I've read some. But I am sure you didn't bring me here to discuss oriental poetry. What do you really want?
You know there's an old western saying, "Some die too early, some too late, but the blessed die at right time."
